-- Convert input patarmeters to proper FL pictures
SCR4733 Program start, clear MQ
Part1 (only night program)
Part 2
... in case of PI.DEBC_NO > 0 also confidential clients are updated in part 1
Part 3
Option 1: remove concentration markcodes from invo
//calculation of the maximum and exceeded concentration
Option 3
... check if the limit is sufficient to finance the invoice which no longer has to be deducted for concentration
-- Store one row to SILO if all invoices are handled
-- Preparations before call of GB101
... reset variables
-- The reduction of concentration should not result in the limit to be exceeded
@ If V.MUT <= 0 then it is not possible to update the concentration amount so continue with the next
invoice (could be a credit note)
... Used to trigger the storing of SILO, see T.S.
//calculation of the maximum and exceeded concentration
//handle DEBC rows where v.ExcConcentrationC>0
//Option 1 : No concentration yet (no DCMC row)
//17-01-2005 JP SCR #7485 delete call to BMQ001
//CLNT408_MAXCONCENTRATIONREJECT = 'Y'
//Option 2 = Already concentration present (existing DCMC row)
CLNT408_MAXCONCENTRATIONJREJECT = 'Y'
